author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: playsoju
short: Automatically send replies to Spotify links with Soju Player links, for mobile users
description: Automatically send a reply to Spotify links with Soju links. Soju for Spotify lets you listen to music samples from Spotify links on any device.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
